SEARCH
Package org.vulcanium.util.noise

Class SimplexNoiseGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.vulcanium.util.noise.NoiseGenerator
org.vulcanium.util.noise.PerlinNoiseGenerator
org.vulcanium.util.noise.SimplexNoiseGenerator
@Deprecated public class SimplexNoiseGenerator extends PerlinNoiseGenerator
Deprecated.
Generates simplex-based noise.

This is a modified version of the freely published version in the paper by Stefan Gustavson at http://staffwww.itn.liu.se/~stegu/simplexnoise/simplexnoise.pdf
